email_body: Congrats, thought you were headed to aig. how long til you get to short natty again? slafontaine@globalp.com on 04/04/2001 02:05:52 PM To: slafontaine@globalp.com cc: Subject: moving on i ve resigned from global today. it is a difficult decision from the stand point that I have been very happy in the short time I've been here. I wil still be in the energy business doing very much the same as i am doing now. I felt that the oportunity which came up was the best thing for my career and family in the long term. I look forward to speaking to all of you in the future and I'll contact you as soon as i get set up in the next couple of weeks. home phone 508-893-6043 home email oakley2196@aol.com regards,steve
